title: The emperor of the moon a farce : as it is acted by Their Majesties servants at the Queens Theatre / written by Mrs. A. Behn.
author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
publisher: Printed by R. Holt for Joseph Knight and Francis Saunders ...,
notes: Based on: Arlequin empereur dans le monde de la lune, which was originally translated from Italian.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
